competitors.name: Grace & Rose Downtown Paso Robles Farmhouse Restaurant

reviews.text: We got to Paso in the evening and didn‚Äôt realize this town was so sleepy. There weren‚Äôt many options so we chose this place. You pay at the counter. Service was great. Good was great. They actually came out pretty quick for a Friday night. Ambiance was ok. In the heart of things and glad they were open on a Friday night.
Incredible pizza!  So flavorful.  The Pesto Calzone was scrumptious!

PPK offers delivery all day after eleven (?). They are my jam when I can‚Äôt leave the studio. They always arrive before they say they will. Driver is friendly, courteous and rabbit quick. I‚Äôm never disappointed in what he/she brings. Pizza is pizza, right? Nope, wrong. This is PPK pizza. See for yourself!!

PPK is a high quality pizza restaurant in the heart of Paso Robles. Their menu has a lot of nice varieties of pizza ingredients as well as similar foods like sandwiches and calzones, and their atmosphere is clean and pleasant. Reasonable prices, too. It‚Äôs clearly a popular local place,  because even on a Sunday late afternoon its tables are filled with satisfied patrons. The pizzas came out delicious, and I will definitely be returning.

The only downside is that the pizza is so good that you‚Äôll probably end up eating your leftovers before even leaving the restaurant.

I met with a group of friends, and both the food and drinks were great across the board. I would definitely recommend coming here with family, friends, or even on a date. I've always had a great experience.

recentReviews.text: Some of the best pizza I‚Äôve tried ! Going tomorrow back into downtown to watch some NFL love the atmosphere here in paso !

We got to Paso in the evening and didn‚Äôt realize this town was so sleepy. There weren‚Äôt many options so we chose this place. You pay at the counter. Service was great. Good was great. They actually came out pretty quick for a Friday night. Ambiance was ok. In the heart of things and glad they were open on a Friday night.

PPK offers delivery all day after eleven (?). They are my jam when I can‚Äôt leave the studio. They always arrive before they say they will. Driver is friendly, courteous and rabbit quick. I‚Äôm never disappointed in what he/she brings. Pizza is pizza, right? Nope, wrong. This is PPK pizza. See for yourself!!
I ordered a large pizza for delivery. It was delivered so fast. And so delicious. The sauce is the best I have ever had on a pizza.
Best pizza and wings! I love this pizza!!
We did take out. Pizza New York style and chicken sliders. Both very good.
PPK on the park always delivers amazing food and a seamless experience. Great location!

detailedReviews.author: Luxvacationer
detailedReviews.text: Some of the best pizza I‚Äôve tried ! Going tomorrow back into downtown to watch some NFL love the atmosphere here in paso !

detailedReviews.author: Trish Wright
detailedReviews.text: We got to Paso in the evening and didn‚Äôt realize this town was so sleepy. There weren‚Äôt many options so we chose this place. You pay at the counter. Service was great. Good was great. They actually came out pretty quick for a Friday night. Ambiance was ok. In the heart of things and glad they were open on a Friday night.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Stang
detailedReviews.text: PPK offers delivery all day after eleven (?). They are my jam when I can‚Äôt leave the studio. They always arrive before they say they will. Driver is friendly, courteous and rabbit quick. I‚Äôm never disappointed in what he/she brings. Pizza is pizza, right? Nope, wrong. This is PPK pizza. See for yourself!!

detailedReviews.author: Angela Aniol
detailedReviews.text: I ordered a large pizza for delivery. It was delivered so fast. And so delicious. The sauce is the best I have ever had on a pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Kristie Knoll
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza and wings! I love this pizza!!

detailedReviews.author: Jesse Munoz
detailedReviews.text: Best Pizza in Paso Robles

detailedReviews.author: Maureen Fox
detailedReviews.text: We did take out. Pizza New York style and chicken sliders. Both very good.

detailedReviews.author: deanna porter
detailedReviews.text: PPK on the park always delivers amazing food and a seamless experience. Great location!

detailedReviews.author: laney
detailedReviews.text: yummy

detailedReviews.author: danelle jarzynski
detailedReviews.text: Best in town

detailedReviews.author: Nick Ingwerson
detailedReviews.text: decent pizza when you can get it. service is terrible. When you go in there and it's empty. It takes forever. I just called to get a delivery. They said 30 minutes over an hour and a half later Nothing no call, no consideration.  No professionalism And the PPK East is worse.

detailedReviews.author: Lori Perry-Sebold
detailedReviews.text: Friendly service and good pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Fredd Overpack
detailedReviews.text:
Excellent menu and the pies are amazing, Mediterranean chicken Sammi  is amazing too, definitely the best pie in Paso period..
Anyone on here that were whining on the reviews are just that whiners......

detailedReviews.author: Sharon Naranjo
detailedReviews.text: Never disappointed! Taste, delivery above par. Always recommend to friends the margarita pizza with added Canadian bacon and pineapple.

detailedReviews.author: James Bennett
detailedReviews.text: Eat here all the time. Our go to place in Paso Robles

detailedReviews.author: Crystal Mancuso
detailedReviews.text: Love this place the food is delicious the cheese steak sandwich has been the best in town so far. I also like that the price of things didn't brake the bank either.

detailedReviews.author: Kassandra Anderson
detailedReviews.text: My husbands parents used to own this place in 2011. Its gone down hill since. Bad owners. Well over priced, quality not good, service always terrible especially delivery. Have had glass in my drinks before. I've seen the cooks drop things on the ground then continue using them without washing. Lots of employees have had bad experiences there. I would eat at marvs or anywhere else!

detailedReviews.author: Trevor Clinard
detailedReviews.text: My family loves ppk. Great pizza and food.

detailedReviews.author: Dan Castro
detailedReviews.text:
PPK is a high quality pizza restaurant in the heart of Paso Robles. Their menu has a lot of nice varieties of pizza ingredients as well as similar foods like sandwiches and calzones, and their atmosphere is clean and pleasant. Reasonable prices, too. It‚Äôs clearly a popular local place,  because even on a Sunday late afternoon its tables are filled with satisfied patrons. The pizzas came out delicious, and I will definitely be returning.

The only downside is that the pizza is so good that you‚Äôll probably end up eating your leftovers before even leaving the restaurant.

detailedReviews.author: Beau/Kelli Bullard
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm pretty much a harsh food critic but i like this pizza fresh ingredients the key to any good meal good job PPk keep it up

detailedReviews.author: Michelle Herrera
detailedReviews.text: Lasagna when you can get it is off the charts.  Pizza is great as well

detailedReviews.author: Mike Daniel
detailedReviews.text: Have placed online orders a number of times, always great food and speedy service.

detailedReviews.author: Anthony Cuellar
detailedReviews.text: We loving coming here. The staff is always so friendly and the food is amazing. Our go to is the kitchen sink pizza. you have to try it

detailedReviews.author: Naomie Lavery
detailedReviews.text: This is our favorite pizza spot in town. We have been regulars there since they opened. We usually get the Butcher's Block and the Kitchen Sink. Their pizza is delicious and cooked just right. Lots of flavor.

detailedReviews.author: ErinRae Peterson
detailedReviews.text: Food was great!

detailedReviews.author: Dan Doornbos
detailedReviews.text: Great place to get a pizza. They have an awesome salad bar, but I think the salad bar is a little bit overpriced.

detailedReviews.author: Joan Leis
detailedReviews.text: I love the thin crust of the pizza, toppings are generous and the flavor is always fabulous!

detailedReviews.author: Paula B-H
detailedReviews.text: One of the best pizza places in town. My kids love it! Service is fast and friendly

detailedReviews.author: bigpoppa33
detailedReviews.text: Recommend pepperoni with bacon pizza with Alfredo Sauce!!!!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Marci Rene Reynoso
detailedReviews.text: Our go to pizza place! Local favorite ‚ù§Ô∏è

detailedReviews.author: Ricky Ruffin
detailedReviews.text: This is my favorite pizza place in town!! Great staff, better food and love to sit and enjoy a Game here.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Peck
detailedReviews.text: Love the service and the pizza. The rewards are also a nice perk.

detailedReviews.author: rocio valente
detailedReviews.text: The best place to eat pizza in Paso Robles this place is  my favoriteüçï

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Arano
detailedReviews.text: Great

detailedReviews.author: K HW
detailedReviews.text: Incredible pizza!  So flavorful.  The Pesto Calzone was scrumptious!

detailedReviews.author: Loni Reneau
detailedReviews.text: I met with a group of friends, and both the food and drinks were great across the board. I would definitely recommend coming here with family, friends, or even on a date. I've always had a great experience.

detailedReviews.author: Ken Collinsworth
detailedReviews.text: We‚Äôve been to every pizza place in town for the past 30 years we keep coming back to Ppk. The Sicilian supreme is our favorite pizza. We‚Äôve had every pizza on the menu many times this is our go to!

detailedReviews.author: Ken Collinsworth
detailedReviews.text: We got the Sicilian supreme, and that is hands-down the best pizza in this place! I have had all pizza of them a few times each!

detailedReviews.author: Pamela Nelson
detailedReviews.text: LOVE PPK at the Park.  Pizza is always delicious and the staff a delight.  Thank you for bringing such joy to many an evening.

detailedReviews.author: Douglas Hidinger
detailedReviews.text: Love this place.  Pizza, wings and cheese bread were a hit for the family

detailedReviews.author: Alex
detailedReviews.text:
Had the pizza, pepperoni and sausage. A little Blase But. the cheeseburger. My father-in-law had was excellent. The fries Wedges were good
But overall the experience was good.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Johns
detailedReviews.text: Wings and Pizza were good

detailedReviews.author: Andy MacDonald
detailedReviews.text: Hands down the best pizza in Paso! Their Chicken Sicilian is my favorite. Love the white sauce.

detailedReviews.author: Sherry Hayes
detailedReviews.text: Very friendly staff. Order was ready on time. The pizza was delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Lauren K
detailedReviews.text: It‚Äôs not New York good, but it‚Äôs the best in Paso, in my opinion. Always consistent, which is great, and they‚Äôre on time for pickups, even when they‚Äôre slammed. They don‚Äôt always cut the slices evenly, but whatever, it still very good.

detailedReviews.author: E Brown
detailedReviews.text: They are family friendly always correct any mistakes if any I never had any bad experiences with the staff they are positive and friendly!!

detailedReviews.author: Kraig Kinder
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Paso Robles, make sure you get the wings as well with there in house sauce on it, they are absolutely Delicious ü§§

detailedReviews.author: Shawna Kamber
detailedReviews.text: Excellent Pizza and Fast Delivery!

detailedReviews.author: Drew Statik
detailedReviews.text: So so so much better than the Paso Pizza Kitchen East (Creston). Great customer service,  friendly vibe and unlike East, they never run out of staple items.

detailedReviews.author: Philip Henry
detailedReviews.text: I eat here a couple times a week. The experience is always great. Smiling faces and the food is great. A must try. Today I had delivery.

detailedReviews.author: Vi Burdge
detailedReviews.text: The best, great service, as always & definitely the Best Pizza in town

detailedReviews.author: Sarah Lullie
detailedReviews.text: The BEST pizza place in town easily and one of the best ever. Everything amazing always. Super consistent. Service is fantastic. Just superb all around!

detailedReviews.author: Shelley Stone
detailedReviews.text: I am from out of town and I went there to have a personalized sized pizza. I had a marvelous pizza, the most popular pizza on their menu, and it was absolutely delicious! Everything was fresh and wonderful tasting, the sauce of the pizza was excellent. It‚Äôs definitely a family restaurant which is great for people with children. I was there with my Service animal which they welcomed. There was no negative experiences with me taking my service animal into the restaurant. Being from out of town, I didn‚Äôt quite know what to expect but the experience was very good and I hope to go back before I leave the Paso Robles area.

detailedReviews.author: Miguel Lopez
detailedReviews.text: Good

detailedReviews.author: Christine Loewen
detailedReviews.text: I did an online order. My pizza and twists came before their scheduled delivery time . My food was still warm and delicious. Will be ordering again.

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Lozano
detailedReviews.text: I'm there every sports event this place is really my number 1 spot

detailedReviews.author: Jamie Wiley
detailedReviews.text: Best food and service in town!

detailedReviews.author: Whisper Hobbs
detailedReviews.text:
This is hands down the best pizza place to go to for great food everything on there menu is to die for delicious .
I've been eating here for many years and its still the family favorite
we come almost every weekend and such wonderful people that work there as well all in all 10 out of 10

detailedReviews.author: Kerby Bedolla
detailedReviews.text: Had ordered 3 pizzas for my kids birthday party in the park. Just as I was walking over to pick them up it started raining!! PPK in the Park was able to accommodate 30 people with 5 minutes notice!! Excellent service and pizza!!

detailedReviews.author: Pa-mella
detailedReviews.text: Great food great overall experience. The employees were fantastic and friendly.

detailedReviews.author: Susan Douglas
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food at a great price.  Best pizza we've had in a long time!!

detailedReviews.author: Robert Hood
detailedReviews.text: Always awesome pizza, my favorite in town.

detailedReviews.author: David Sabala
detailedReviews.text: Awesome! It‚Äôs happiness in food form.

detailedReviews.author: Frankie De Lespinesse
detailedReviews.text: Love this place

detailedReviews.author: Kamini Patel
detailedReviews.text: Very good service and pizza was  really good

detailedReviews.author: Jose Rosas
detailedReviews.text: The food is always great! The always are on top of the needs on the table. It is a family friendly place and you can see they try to improve!  Keep up the good work!!!

detailedReviews.author: Robert W. Brown
detailedReviews.text: Food is always exceptional and the staff is always very hospitable

detailedReviews.author: Jared McKiernan
detailedReviews.text: My favorite local business! Great service, remarkable consistency, excellent pizza (esp. the kitchen sink), best mozzarella sticks I‚Äôve ever had. Can‚Äôt recommend these guys enough!

detailedReviews.author: Stacia Finley Reccord
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza. Ready in a flash!! Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Rachael Lu
detailedReviews.text: Always fun to go in and eat, every employee is a delight with my 5 yr Daughter. The food is always great, always a clean floors and clean bathroom.

detailedReviews.author: Candice Conover
detailedReviews.text: We were are large group celebrating a birthday. Once we ordered, we were all served our pizzas within 15 minutes! Great service and great pizza. We will be returning!

detailedReviews.author: Emma The Dilemma
detailedReviews.text:
Delicious pizza. What more could you want?
It's definitely an added bonus for being down town, having a great dining in area, and amazing service.
This is a perfect little pizzaria that hits the spot

detailedReviews.author: Trevor Layton
detailedReviews.text: Horrible. First the pizza is disgusting. Worse is we came here for a quick meal, they gave our pizza to someone else. Fine honest mistake. But we had to wait almost 40 minutes for a fast food pizza that should take 10. Refused to even comp us the meal. Shocked how this place has a rating it does.

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Mahoney
detailedReviews.text: So yummy

detailedReviews.author: Tracey O
detailedReviews.text: Awesome food! We stopped in Paso on our way home and found this great spot for dinner. We are a group of 4 and there were lots of options to meet each person's appetite for dinner. Lasagna was excellent, as were the pizzas. Fresh ingredients, good portions. Salads were also very fresh and made to order.

detailedReviews.author: Cat Contreras
detailedReviews.text: Only place I will order pizza from in this area. Our favorite for years!

detailedReviews.author: Emily Baranek
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, great service!

detailedReviews.author: Michelle Carroll
detailedReviews.text: The manager on duty was amazing. Her service was impeccable. Every restaurant in town should have a manager like her. What a blessing to continue to order food from PPK on the Park and have the best experience. Great tasting food and awesome delivery service.

detailedReviews.author: Dave Sutherlen
detailedReviews.text: excellent üçï We love their gluten free options. Highly recommend!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.8/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the fast delivery service, often arriving quicker than expected. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The pizza sauce is frequently mentioned as the best customers have ever had, setting the pizza apart from competitors. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The restaurant is a go-to spot for locals, indicating strong customer loyalty and satisfaction. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and poor service, especially with delivery - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues, including complaints about service and food quality - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness - social media marketing can improve this area
